description: Updates the specified properties of a given geofence collection.

parameters.name: CollectionName
parameters.description: The name of the geofence collection to update.

nested_items.name: CollectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the updated geofence collection.

nested_items.name: CollectionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the updated geofence collection. Used to specify a resource across Amazon Web Services.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the geofence collection was last updated in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.
